page.title: 11Farming in Fremington Area
page.content: My name is Peter Gillard. I live at Higher Lydacott Farm. We keep sheep we have 200 acres. Our neighbours live at Lydacott Farm. They grow crops like corn and potatoes. They keep a few sheep and beef. My friend Peter Stagg lives at Collacot Farm. They have sheep and beef and grow potatoes and sell them to Mr. Bradley. They have 120 acres.My dad's friend that lives at Lower Knightacott Farm keeps sheep and beef and he owns 106 acres. Mr. Bradley lives at Knightacott Farm. He keeps sheep and beef and he keeps Bradley's shop. He owns about 50 acres. Michael Isaac lives on Horsacott Farm he keeps sheep and beef. He owns 100 acres. Mr. Stacy lives at Kari_Koa Farm. He keeps sheep and beef and he has 150 acres.
